_header: In wilderness / There found I Bess
_description: A betrayed maiden, with a chanson d’aventure opening — eight 6-line tail-rhyme stanzas

BLEge3002.Transcription:
In wildernysþer found I besSecret A loneIn grete
                    distresRemedilesMakyng here mone
